Toronto, Canada

Discover Your Career

A online community for Toronto Arts & Science grads looking for meaningful careers.

Learn more Request Invite
Powered by Typeform

Why join?

The Clear Career community is a place where you can turn to when you are feeling discouraged, hopeless, and confused about your career.

Support Network

Tap into a network of talented, ambitious and enthusiastic individuals looking to get ahead.

Job Opportunities

Post career opportunities you find out about and discover career opportunities that suit you.

Job Hacking

Learn the best tips and tricks on how to have your job application stand out.

Resumes & Cover Letters

Work together with other new grads and experienced young professionals at optimizing your resume and cover letter.

Workshops

Gain access to live events, webinars and workshops that will help guide you in toward your desired career.

Cross Browser

Online Slack Community

Our community lives on Slack, one of the most rapidly adopted communication platforms adopted by startups and companies worldwide. Separating different topics into channels, Slack is the ideal tool for an online community like ours.

Download the Slack Mobile and Desktop apps for free and stay connected to the community at all times.
